body: libcudf `Aggregation` objects have implementations of hash and equality. We should expose these in pylibcudf so we can put the aggregation objects into dictionaries correctly.

labels.name: pylibcudf
labels.description: Issues specific to the pylibcudf package

title: [FEA] Implement `__hash__` and `__eq__` for pylibcudf Aggregation objecs.
